data.name: ReadHearing
data.value: select top(1) HEARING_ID, HEARING_DT, HEARING_TIME, TYPE, LAST_NM, FIRST_NM, MIDDLE_INT, SUFFIX, TITLE, OUTCOME_RECEIVE_DT, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, OUTCOME, NOTE from CKT_HEARING where HEARING_ID = @hearingId

data.name: UpdateHearing
data.value: update CKT_HEARING set HEARING_DT = @hearingDt, HEARING_TIME = @hearingTime, LAST_NM = @lastNm, FIRST_NM = @firstNm, MIDDLE_INT = @middleInt, SUFFIX = @suffix, TITLE = @title, OUTCOME_RECEIVE_DT = @outcomeReceiveDt, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp, OUTCOME = @outcome, NOTE = @note where HEARING_ID = @hearingId
